TextBody:
Hi Chris,

Thanks for reaching out!
The 6.0.1.6 client version is also affected by this.
The available update will still show up even after applying it. You can check in the View Applied EPP Software Updates to check if the hotfix was applied:


Best regards,
Botond Biro | Technical Support Engineer
